item.title: AtCoder JSC2019 Qual B sum and inverse of arithmetic sequence solved with Ruby and Python
item.description: #Introduction AtCoder Problems is used to solve past problems. Thank you, AtCoder and AtCoder Problems. This time AtCoder JSC2019 Qual B-Kleene Inversion Difficulty: 797 The theme of this time, sum of arithmetic sequences + inverse element Ruby For the first time, I’ll hear the number of falls, but let’s see what the number of falls is for the example 1 3 2. K 3 2 1 Total 132 1 1 132 132 4 1 5 132 132 132 7 4 1 12 One 1 3 2 is 1, two side by side 1 3 2 1 3 2 is 4 + 1, and three are 1 3 2 1 3 2 1 3 2 is 7 You can see that the sum is + 4 + 1 and the arithmetic progression.
